name: Date With a Girl: Mahjong
description:
Date with a girl: mahjong - In this mahjong connect game you have to go on a date with a beautiful girl. Connect pairs of the same goodies to please her and achieve something more than just communication .. Take her through the most beautiful places and pay your attention and then you will surely succeed!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics from Hanne K
- Nice soundtrack
